amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the bill's funding level by $12.4 billion across-the-board, returning the bill to the FY 2009 funding level and translating into an 18% reduction from the proposed level.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 111-578 to reduce the bill's funding level by $12.4 billion dollars, returning the bill to the FY2009 funding level. This is an 18% cut in the bill's spending.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Culberson amendment Failed by recorded vote: 169 - 252 (Roll no. 490).
